data.title: SLA Industries 2nd Edition

data.text:
Physical Copies of the GM Screen and Rule Book are Available on our Site: https://store.nightfall.games/sla-industries-rpg.html

Expanding SLA Industries 2nd Edition, the GM Pack adds extra material to help get your campaign up and running. Whether you prefer your SLA campaign to dwell on the urban horrors of serial killers or the brutality of Ex-War Criminals, this guide has material for you.

Inside are mini campaign seeds for Collateral, Cult, Corporate and Conflict playstyles as well as two detailed Hunter sheets and a wealth of soft companies eager to sponsor up-and-coming Operatives.
